title: Manufacturers' Inventories, Total for United States
notes:
Series Is Presented Here As Two Variables--(1)--Seasonally Adjusted Data, 1929-1944 (2)--Original Data, 1938-1969. The Indexes Represent Values At The End Of The Month. Source: National Industrial Conference Board, Clyde L. Rogers, "Inventories, Shipments, Orders, 1929-1940: Revised Indexes, " The Conference Board Economic Record, Vol. 2, Supplement Of December 26, 1940, P. 3; The Economic Almanac, Through May 1944 (For Seasonal Revisions See Almanac For 1942-1943, P. 130); The Confernce Board Business Record, September 1944

This NBER data series m05104a appears on the NBER website in Chapter 5 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter05.html.

NBER Indicator: m05104a
